players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm concerned about Charlie's sudden disappearance. We should keep a close eye on each other and work together to uncover the truth."
You: "I'm glad Alice brought up the issue of Charlie's disappearance. Let's all be honest and open about our whereabouts during the night to help find answers."

Diana: "Let's review the events of last night. Bob, can you tell us where you were between 9 PM and 12 AM? Alice, we already know your role as the mafioso, so please refrain from speaking unless absolutely necessary."
Bob: " I was at the edge of the forest, I didn't see anyone else there and I went back to camp around 11:30 PM."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
